extDescript.message: With this extension, you can list all the attachments in your Gmail, and download them in a batch, or add them into your latest DRAFT.

hintListing.message: Getting the attachments list ... (you can temporarily turn off this interface to continue other operations, it will pop up automatically after forming the list)

hintInserting.message: Adding the attachment $name$ into the latest draft...

finishInsert.message: $name$ has been successfully added to the latest draft

hintForSearch.message: Input key words to search the list below

errorOfUnauthorized.message: Fail to be authorized, please redo the authorization!

errorOfConnection.message: Connection error, please try again, or refresh the current web page!

draftBoxEmpty.message: Your DRAFT box is empty, please create a draft first!

failLoading.message: Loading fails. Please press F5 to refresh the page.(It is recommonded to wait for the loading of the gmail page finished to activate the Assist interface.)
